```{r}
library(dplyr)
library(tidyr)
```

```{r}
df = read.csv("jellyfish.csv") %>% 
  dplyr::select(Source, Year, Month, Day, Type, Lat, Lon) %>% 
  drop_na() %>%
  mutate(Date = as.Date(sprintf("%04d-%02d-%02d", Year, Month, Day))) %>% 
  dplyr::select(-Year, -Month, -Day) %>%
  st_as_sf(coords = c("Lon", "Lat"), crs = 4326) %>%
  rename(
    date = Date,
    source = Source,
    type = Type
  )

species = "lionsmane"
pts = csv_make_obs_bkg(sp = species)
obs = pts$obs
bkg = pts$bkg
```
